Finding a good tailor can be a challenge! Unfortunately, I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or location-specific recommendations. However, I can offer some tips to help you find a reliable tailor to hem your jeans:

1. **Ask for referrals**: Ask friends, family, or coworkers who have similar taste in clothing for recommendations. They might have a trusted tailor they can suggest.
2. **Online reviews**: Check online review platforms like Yelp, Google Reviews, or Facebook Reviews to find tailors in your area with good ratings and reviews. Pay attention to comments about their work quality, communication, and turnaround time.
3. **Check social media**: Many tailors have social media profiles showcasing their work. Look for before-and-after photos, testimonials, and examples of their alterations.
4. **Local dry cleaners**: Sometimes, dry cleaners offer alteration services or know of a good tailor in the area. They might be able to recommend someone reliable.
5. **Check local tailoring associations**: Look for professional associations like the National Federation of Tailors and Dressmakers or the Custom Tailors and Designers Association. These organizations might have a list of certified tailors in your area.
6. **Check their experience**: When you find a potential tailor, ask about their experience with hemming jeans specifically. A good tailor will have experience with different fabrics, including denim.
7. **Get a quote and ask questions**: Contact the tailor and ask about their pricing, turnaround time, and any specific requirements they may have (e.g., bringing in the jeans with the original hem intact).
8. **Check their work**: Before committing, ask to see examples of their work or ask if they have a portfolio. This will give you an idea of their attention to detail and quality of work.

Remember to communicate clearly with your chosen tailor about your expectations, including the desired length, style of hem, and any specific requests you may have.

I hope these tips help you find a reliable tailor to hem your new jeans!
